mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.motif, m.date, m.end_time, m.start_time, m.state, r.address FROM mrs_meeting m LEFT JOIN mrs_meeting_room r ON m.meeting_room_id = r.id WHERE m.creator_id = #{creatorId} and m.status = 1

SELECT m.meeting_room_id, m.start_time, m.end_time, m.motif, u.username, r.`name` FROM mrs_meeting m LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON m.creator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN mrs_meeting_room r ON m.`meeting_room_id` = r.`id` WHERE m.meeting_room_id = #{meetingRoomId} AND m.date = #{date} and m.status = 1
